channel.title: My items for trade

item.title: My items for trade
item.content:encoded:
Ok my in game name is warchariot and i'm willing to trade the following itemsâ€¦

I'm looking for every rune except the one use to make the cowl, and Kaju drops which I may not have, golden items, that sort of thing, let me know here or in game
